TitleEnglish: I'm a Curse Crafter, and I Don't Need an S-Rank Party!
SummaryEnglish: Gail Hamilton, a curse crafter, was dismissed from his party after being promoted to the Guild's "S" rank. Unbeknownst to them, Gail now works alone, using creepy curses to cause a sensation.
Aliases: Ｓランクパーティから解雇された【呪具師】
Sランクパーティから解雇された【呪具師】
S-Rank Party kara Kaiko Sareta "Jugushi": "Noroi no Item" Shika Tsukuremasenga, Sono Seinō wa Artifact-kyū Nari......!
My S-Rank Party Fired Me for Being a Cursificer: I Can Only Make "Cursed Items", but They're Artifact Class!
